headline: Black Music Action Coalition's BMAC LIVE Accelerator Program Returns
summary: The Black Music Action Coalition (BMAC), in partnership with Live Nation, the world's leading live entertainment company, announces the return of the BMAC LIVE Accelerator Program for its second year. Powered by Live Nation's School of Live, the program provides 20 emerging music business professionals with an all-expenses-paid, week-long immersive experience focused on career pathways in the live music industry. Applications for the 2025 BMAC LIVE Accelerator Program open on Monday, May 5, 2025
